name: UpdateWebhookSignatureKey
description:
Update a webhook subscription's signature key.

Use this tool to replace the existing signature key for a webhook subscription with a new one. This is specifically for managing webhook security by updating the signature key.

parameters.name: webhook_subscription_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Webhook Subscription to update. This is a required field.

value_schema.description: [REQUIRED] The ID of the [Subscription](entity:WebhookSubscription) to update.

parameters.name: unique_request_identifier
parameters.description: A unique string to identify the UpdateWebhookSubscriptionSignatureKey request, ensuring idempotency.

value_schema.description: A unique string that identifies the [UpdateWebhookSubscriptionSignatureKey](api-endpoint:WebhookSubscriptions-UpdateWebhookSubscriptionSignatureKey) request.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: subscription_id
parameters.description: [REQUIRED] The ID of the [Subscription](entity:WebhookSubscription) to update.

value_schema.description: [REQUIRED] The ID of the [Subscription](entity:WebhookSubscription) to update.

parameters.name: idempotency_key
parameters.description: A unique string that identifies the [UpdateWebhookSubscriptionSignatureKey](api-endpoint:WebhookSubscriptions-UpdateWebhookSubscriptionSignatureKey) request.

value_schema.description: A unique string that identifies the [UpdateWebhookSubscriptionSignatureKey](api-endpoint:WebhookSubscriptions-UpdateWebhookSubscriptionSignatureKey) request.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
